page.title: 03Occupations in S.Clifton
page.content: Apart from farming,there is a wide range of employment in the area.This is probably because the pleasant village atmoshere provides suitable housing for people who work in nearby towns or travel around the area.Employment in villages is also available in two chicken farms,a market garden,a nursing home and a garage.Other occupations of people include engineers,teachers,sales people,nurses,a bus driver, a lorry driver,power station workers,miners and cleaners.As in most areas today there are some unemployed people and several retired families.There are two Riding Stables providing leisure time pursuits.There are only two shops in the area .One in South Clifton and one in Low Marnham.There is also a Post Office in South Clifton.
